Page.name: ESelectServerPage
Page.Title: Server Selection
Page.Description: This is server selection page. Before logging into NED you have to provide NED server address. Server address is set only once. To reset server address use Factory Reset. Example server address: http://example.com:8080

Page.name: EUserLoginPage
Page.Title: User Authentication
Page.Description: This is user authentication page. Here you can login with your Username and Password.

Page.name: ELibraryListPage
Page.Title: List of Libraries
Page.Description: List of Libraries shows Libraries selected in Libraries Manager. Tap on a Library to browse it's contents. Before Library can be browsed for the first time it is automaticaly fetched from the server.

Page.name: ELibraryManagerPage
Page.Title: Library Manager
Page.Description: Library Manager gives you possibility to add new libraries and manage their visibility in the List of Libraries.

Page.name: ESettingsPage
Page.Title: Settings
Page.Description: Here you can change application application behaviour by adjusting it's settings. You can also manage current user account and reset whole application.

Page.name: EStatisticsPage
Page.Title: Statistics
Page.Description: Here you can see statistics related to Media Items usage

Page.name: EDownloadsPage
Page.Title: Downloads
Page.Description: Here you can view all downloads, their state and progress.

Page.name: ECataloguePage
Page.Title: Library: Catalogues List
Page.Description: Catalogues list level is top most level of the Library. Catalogues list shows all available Catalogues in the selected Library.

Page.name: ECategoryPage
Page.Title: Library: Categories List
Page.Description: Categories list shows all available Categories in the selected Catalogue. You can also see how many Media Items are in the Category and how many of them are already downloaded (local)

Page.name: EMediaItemsPage
Page.Title: Library: Media Items List
Page.Description: Media Items list shows all available Media Items in the selected Category. Tap the item to add it to download queue or longpress to get more options.

Page.name: EMediaItemPage
Page.Title: Library: Media Item
Page.Description: Here you can see all the data associated with the Media Item. It can be Text, Picture, Audio or Video.

Page.name: ESearchPage
Page.Title: Search
Page.Description: You can use Search to find Media Items using keywords that were associated with them. Search results will be narrowed depending on your current locatin in the Library. To search the whole Library launch Search from Catalogues List

HelpItem.name: RemoveUser
HelpItem.Title: Remove user
HelpItem.Description: Removes local user account. All files associated with user are also removed.

HelpItem.name: FactoryReset
HelpItem.Title: Factory reset
HelpItem.Description: Returns application to it's initial state. All local user accounts, files and data are deleted.

HelpItem.name: SwitchUser
HelpItem.Title: Logout user
HelpItem.Description: Logs out current user. 'Remember Me!' option is unset.

HelpItem.name: LoginButton
HelpItem.Title: Log in button
HelpItem.Description: Press button to get authenticated using username and password entered in text fields.

HelpItem.name: UsernamePassword
HelpItem.Title: Username and Password
HelpItem.Description: To start using NED you have to provide correct username and password registered on selected server

HelpItem.name: RememberMe
HelpItem.Title: Remember Me!
HelpItem.Description: Remember me option is used to save entered username and password. Username and password will be remembered only after successfull authentication.

HelpItem.name: Statistics
HelpItem.Title: Statistics
HelpItem.Description: Shows page with some basic usage statistics that are waiting to be sent to server

HelpItem.name: Settings
HelpItem.Title: Settings
HelpItem.Description: Shows page with settings that help you control NED behaviour

HelpItem.name: SearchButton
HelpItem.Title: Search
HelpItem.Description: Shows page where you can find items by typing keywords.

HelpItem.name: DownloadAll
HelpItem.Title: Download all
HelpItem.Description: Download all option downloads all Media Items contained that belong to our current location in a Library. For example while pressed in the Catalogue List page it will add to download queue all Media Items in current Library while when pressed in Media List level only Media Items from currently visible list will be downloaded.

HelpItem.name: DeleteLibItem
HelpItem.Title: Delete Library Item
HelpItem.Description: You can delete Library item from local copy of the Library by longpressing the item to be deleted. Selected item and all subitems will be removed. To recover deleted items you have to use 'Check for updates' option in Library Manager (Warning: It will remove all current changes and downloaded files from updated library)

HelpItem.name: StartStopDownload
HelpItem.Title: Start/Stop download
HelpItem.Description: Tap the item to toggle between Paused and Queued states. Once item is Queued it will automatically get downloaded.

HelpItem.name: DownloadItemStates
HelpItem.Title: Download States
HelpItem.Description: There are four possible download states: Downloading - item is beeing currently downloaded from the server. Connecting - item is fetching file information and is about to start downloading. Queued - item will be downloaded as soon as possible Paused - item won't be downloaded until it is manually started

HelpItem.name: RemoveDownload
HelpItem.Title: Remove download
HelpItem.Description: To remove download from the download queue longpress the item and press cancel.

HelpItem.name: LibraryIdTextField
HelpItem.Title: New library ID
HelpItem.Description: Every library on server has it's unique ID. Enter it here and submit to check if it is available on server. It will be added to the list below the text field.

HelpItem.name: ListAddedLibraries
HelpItem.Title: Show Libraries list
HelpItem.Description: All checked Libraries will be displayed in the List of Libraries. This way you can narrow down the List of Libraries to show only currently needed Libraries.

HelpItem.name: CheckLibraryUpdates
HelpItem.Title: Check for updates
HelpItem.Description: Longpress and select 'Check for updates' on Library you want to update. Warning: It will remove all current changes and downloaded files from updated library

HelpItem.name: RemoveLibrary
HelpItem.Title: Remove library
HelpItem.Description: Longpress and select 'Delete' on Library to remove it. It will also remove all files associated with the Library.

HelpItem.name: MediaDescription
HelpItem.Title: Description
HelpItem.Description: Show additional Media Item description.

HelpItem.name: MediaLinks
HelpItem.Title: Links
HelpItem.Description: Shows weblinks associated to this Media Item.

HelpItem.name: OpenMediaItem
HelpItem.Title: Open Media Item
HelpItem.Description: When item is downloaded you can simply tap it to get it open.

HelpItem.name: DownloadNow
HelpItem.Title: Download Now
HelpItem.Description: Download Now option adds item to download queue and will be downloaded as soon as possible regardless whether automatic downloads are turned On or Off.

HelpItem.name: AddToQueue
HelpItem.Title: Add to Queue
HelpItem.Description: Add to Queue option adds item to download queue depending on downloads settings. If automatic download is On item will be downloaded as soon as possible, if Off item will be added to queue in Paused state and will have to be started manually.

HelpItem.name: AutoStats
HelpItem.Title: Automatic statistics upload
HelpItem.Description: Select automatic or manual statistics upload. When toggled to 'On' statistics are uploaded automatically on every network communication, otherwise have to be uploaded manually from statistcs page

HelpItem.name: AutoDownloads
HelpItem.Title: Automatic downloads
HelpItem.Description: Select automatic or manual downloads. When toggled to 'On' Media Items are automatically added to download queue and downloaded one by oneafter after beeing selected for downloading. Otherwise every Media Item download has to be started manually from Downloads page.

HelpItem.name: UploadStats
HelpItem.Title: Upload Statistics
HelpItem.Description: Press Upload to immediately upload all current user statistics to server.
